abstract: Issues-oriented filmmakers have been promoting political movies in hopes they will influence voters' choice in presidential election.
snippet: In an already hot election cycle, a spate of political movies has advocates and issues-oriented filmmakers looking for ways to exploit movies for electoral advantage.
lead_paragraph: In an already hot election cycle, a spate of political movies has advocates and issues-oriented filmmakers looking for ways to exploit movies for electoral advantage.

headline.main: The Sniping of Partisans, This Time on the Screen
headline.print_headline: The Sniping Of Partisans, This Time On the Screen
headline.seo: Hollywood Revs Up Partisan Films a Year Ahead of Election
